pictures.caption: July 27 2007: Hundreds of religious students occupy the Red Mosque, Lal Masjid, demanding the return of its pro-Taliban cleric, Abdul Aziz, to lead prayers. The protest comes two weeks after a bloody siege at the mosque left more than 100 people dead

image.caption: July 27 2007: Hundreds of religious students occupy the Red Mosque, Lal Masjid, demanding the return of its pro-Taliban cleric, Abdul Aziz, to lead prayers. The protest comes two weeks after a bloody siege at the mosque left more than 100 people dead

pages.trailText: A suspected suicide bomber killed 11 people and injured scores more following renewed violence at Islamabad's Red Mosque

draft.headline: Red Mosque reopens
draft.standfirst:
A suspected suicide bomber today killed 11 people and injured scores more following renewed violence at Islamabad's Red Mosque.
Seven police officers were among those killed when the blast tore though a hotel about a quarter of a mile from the mosque, where religious students clashed earlier in the day with security forces.

pages.trailText:
A suspected suicide bomber today killed 11 people and injured scores more following renewed violence at Islamabad's Red Mosque.
Seven police officers were among those killed when the blast tore though a hotel about a quarter of a mile from the mosque, where religious students clashed earlier in the day with security forces.

A suspected suicide bomber today killed 11 people and injured scores more following renewed violence at Islamabad's Red Mosque.
Seven police officers were among those killed when the blast tore though a hotel about a quarter of a mile from the mosque, where religious students clashed earlier in the day with security forces.
